channel.title: Letting bots on my server
channel.description:
Hey guys,
I'm working with a 508 server now and I want to know how do I let bots on my server? I want to see how many people I can hold to start out with and as I improve how many I can hold as I go along. I've tried Allgofree BlitzBot and another one I got off of RuneServer. Thanks!

item.title: Letting bots on my server
item.dc:creator: @runewings317 runewings317
